title: High ranked team LF players for 2015 Competitive Tournies
body:
High ranked Team LF Master Tier + players preferable, going for top 8 challenger + entering in the new 2015 tournies.

In need of ADC, Jungle/Top players and Supports.

Practicing 5 days a week + entering in weekly tournaments, ranked 5s will be done every night to get to the top 8 challenger.

Post:
IGN:
AGE:
ROLE:
RANK:
AVAILABILITY: 
EXPERIENCE:

Add Btka for more info or if you have any questions.

replies.body:
IGN: LegendAzz
AGE: 15, 16 in 2 months
ROLE: Adc/Top/Mid
RANK: Although i am Bronze 2 i believe i could show you my play style and i was a higher rank but have deranked due to recent break i had.
AVAILABILITY: Now that i am finished school for 8 weeks i am quiet available and would love to be in the team :) 
EXPERIENCE: Have played a lot of ranked and ranked teams although i haven't been as successful as i would like in ranked i think i have great skills to fill out the team and i am a great team player.

IGN: Dopa Apdo
AGE: 20
ROLE: ADC
RANK: Plat3
AVAILABILITY: everyday
EXPERIENCE: play in small teams and been playing game for 3 years. Just trial me against these diamonds and I can prove that I'm worthy.

Im just desperate to join a team and play everyday. im down to sub also.

I'm Interested how many players do you have so far and what is open still ? 

IGN: Fairy law
AGE: 24
ROLE: top main / jungle on the side
RANK: Plat
AVAILABILITY: 24/7
EXPERIENCE: 2-3 years
ATM got a Mid , Possible a master tier jungler, top and support and a diamond 1 ADC but none of those are locked in.
